Posts.Content: Feb 4, 2013 09:30PM bitty1 wrote: I am a single 56 yr old mother of a 35 yr old daughter with 3 beautiful granddaughters 16, 15 and 13. My first dx was in 2000, DCIS , stage 1, bilateral masectomies, reconstruction, tamoxifin. Now I am stage 4 ,it started Nov 2011 in my chestwall, then right axillary and nodes, then left axillary, then 12 spots in chest. Now in my liver, lymph nodes and pleural cavity. Had 2 rounds of radiation. Am doing Faslodex shots now. Waiting for chemo. Trying my best to keep things as normal as possible. I still work part-time , have been for the last 8 yrs. Dont know what I would do if I didnt work..I need the distaction, frankly.
Posts.Title: Roll Call 2013 LilSchatzie reader123
